name: Appointment Confirmation
body: Please confirm your appointment at [Company.name] on [Appointment.startDateFormatted] @ [Appointment.startTimeFormatted]. Reply: [TwilioSettings.confirmCancelOptions], [TwilioSettings.optOutOption]. Call to change [Company.phoneNumberFormatted]

name: Appointment Reminder
body: This is a reminder of your appointment at [Company.name] on [Appointment.startDateFormatted] @ [Appointment.startTimeFormatted]. Reply: [TwilioSettings.confirmCancelOptions], [TwilioSettings.optOutOption]. Call to change [Company.phoneNumberFormatted]
